title: Logging in?
body: Anyone else having issues logging in today?

replies.body: We're looking into reports that players using Cox in some parts of Arizona are having login and connection issues.  If you're impacted by this, I don't have any new updates to share for now.  Hang tight, and keep an eye out on your ISP's support page in the meantime.
I'm trying to login right now and it's just staying in a loop.
yep I cant log in after playing a game just crashed in the middle of the game.
